column4: well... how can I auto executed my pppoe-start after run my kernel ?
You need to enable it in the init sequence, there are maaany ways to do this
Basically I'd suggest using a gui helper. to enable it.
See tty or use mouse in text mode?
and if you'll use ports, you'll need to specify protocol and load protocol settings: -p tcp -m tcp
did you know how protocol I use for 553 port ?
What are you sending over 553? It's not listed on my /etc/services
you seem to be using tcp
